lead_paragraph: A single-engine plane crashed in the intersection of two residential streets, about a block from the Bayport Aerodrome.

headline.print_headline: Pilot and Passenger Are Injured in Plane Crash on Long Island
headline.main: Pilot and Passenger Are Injured in Plane Crash on Long Island

snippet: A single-engine plane crashed in the intersection of two residential streets, about a block from the Bayport Aerodrome.
abstract: Single-engine plane crashes on residential Long Island street near Bayport Aerodrome, injuring pilot Scott Clifford and passenger Michael Rome.
